name: Reign of the Dead
add_text: Equip: You gain a Shard of Flame each time you cause a non-periodic spell critical strike.  When you reach 3 Shards, they will release, firing a Pillar of Flame for 1959 to 2275 damage.  Shard of Flame cannot be gained more often than once every 2 sec. (2 minutes cooldown)
